Thing.name: additionalType
Thing.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

Thing.name: description
Thing.description: A short description of the item.

Thing.name: image
Thing.description: URL of an image of the item.

properties.name: additionalName
properties.description: An additional name for a Person, can be used for a middle name.

properties.name: address
properties.description: Physical address of the item.

properties.name: affiliation
properties.description: An organization that this person is affiliated with. For example, a school/university, a club, or a team.

properties.name: alumniOf
properties.description: An educational organizations that the person is an alumni of.

properties.name: award
properties.description: An award won by this person or for this creative work.

properties.name: awards
properties.description: Awards won by this person or for this creative work. (legacy spelling; see singular form, award)

properties.name: birthDate
properties.description: Date of birth.

properties.name: brand
properties.description: The brand(s) associated with a product or service, or the brand(s) maintained by an organization or business person.

properties.name: children
properties.description: A child of the person.

properties.name: colleague
properties.description: A colleague of the person.

properties.name: colleagues
properties.description: A colleague of the person (legacy spelling; see singular form, colleague).

properties.name: contactPoint
properties.description: A contact point for a person or organization.

properties.name: contactPoints
properties.description: A contact point for a person or organization (legacy spelling; see singular form, contactPoint).

properties.name: deathDate
properties.description: Date of death.

properties.name: duns
properties.description: The Dun & Bradstreet DUNS number for identifying an organization or business person.

properties.name: email
properties.description: Email address.

properties.name: familyName
properties.description: Family name. In the U.S., the last name of an Person. This can be used along with givenName instead of the Name property.

properties.name: faxNumber
properties.description: The fax number.

properties.name: follows
properties.description: The most generic uni-directional social relation.

properties.name: gender
properties.description: Gender of the person.

properties.name: givenName
properties.description: Given name. In the U.S., the first name of a Person. This can be used along with familyName instead of the Name property.

properties.name: globalLocationNumber
properties.description: The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.

properties.name: hasPOS
properties.description: Points-of-Sales operated by the organization or person.

properties.name: homeLocation
properties.description: A contact location for a person's residence.

properties.name: honorificPrefix
properties.description: An honorific prefix preceding a Person's name such as Dr/Mrs/Mr.

properties.name: honorificSuffix
properties.description: An honorific suffix preceding a Person's name such as M.D. /PhD/MSCSW.

properties.name: interactionCount
properties.description: A count of a specific user interactions with this itemâ€”for example, 20 UserLikes, 5 UserComments, or 300 UserDownloads. The user interaction type should be one of the sub types of UserInteraction.

properties.name: isicV4
properties.description: The International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC), Revision 4 code for a particular organization, business person, or place.

properties.name: jobTitle
properties.description: The job title of the person (for example, Financial Manager).

properties.name: knows
properties.description: The most generic bi-directional social/work relation.

properties.name: makesOffer
properties.description: A pointer to products or services offered by the organization or person.

properties.name: memberOf
properties.description: An organization to which the person belongs.

properties.name: naics
properties.description: The North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code for a particular organization or business person.

properties.name: nationality
properties.description: Nationality of the person.

properties.name: owns
properties.description: Products owned by the organization or person.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: A parent of this person.

properties.name: parents
properties.description: A parents of the person (legacy spelling; see singular form, parent).

properties.name: performerIn
properties.description: Event that this person is a performer or participant in.

properties.name: relatedTo
properties.description: The most generic familial relation.

properties.name: seeks
properties.description: A pointer to products or services sought by the organization or person (demand).

properties.name: sibling
properties.description: A sibling of the person.

properties.name: siblings
properties.description: A sibling of the person (legacy spelling; see singular form, sibling).

properties.name: spouse
properties.description: The person's spouse.

properties.name: taxID
properties.description: The Tax / Fiscal ID of the organization or person, e.g. the TIN in the US or the CIF/NIF in Spain.

properties.name: telephone
properties.description: The telephone number.

properties.name: vatID
properties.description: The Value-added Tax ID of the organisation or person.

properties.name: workLocation
properties.description: A contact location for a person's place of work.

properties.name: worksFor
properties.description: Organizations that the person works for.
